label: dog
caption: Outside a primary school, a group of children in their uniforms stand eagerly beside a small playground, chatting excitedly with each other as they wait for recess to begin. Amidst them, a fluffy golden retriever wagging its tail joyfully plays catch with one of the kids, adding to the lively atmosphere of the morning scene. The dog's owner, a smiling teacher, watches over the children from a nearby bench, making sure everyone stays safe and happy.
